answers.answer: Have things always been this way for you or is this a new problem?
always basically...  it never bothered me when I was single....   but I married last year and wish to make my wife happy !!

Get checked for thyroid disease or diabetes.If okay, then start exercise such as running and lifting weights to incrase testosterone.  You could take L-arginine also.  Pumpkin seed supplements are another option.

After ruling out the medical issues, you may add the following exercises to the above general exercises.Sat kriya, circulating awareness around microcosmic orbit.Male Deer exercise. Google these words to get details.
Hey bud, also try something to increase Dopamine levels like SAM-E

question: I have a very low ( practically NO) sex drive...  How can I increase it.
title: sex
